body.text: Welcome to Buttons and Cards School
This is an open source Webex Teams Bot that helps users and developers become familiar with Webex Teams Buttons and Cards.
In this class we'll learn about what a card is, why they might be used, and how applications can use them.   If you are ready to begin just click the **Next Lesson** button to learn what a card is.
Click **Pick Another Lesson** to browse through the lessons available, or **Helpful Resources** to see what else is available.
Oh, and remember that it can take a moment for cards to render!  Be patient after clicking the buttons, and take the time to absorb the previous lesson.
